title: Homeopathic treatment for skin diseases: Why it is better than conventional medicines?
author: Editorial Team
description: One of the significant advantages of homeopathic treatment for skin diseases is the absence of side effects.
cleaned_text: Don't Miss Out on the Latest Updates. When conventional medicines provide only temporary relief for many skin conditions, patients often seek alternative options for permanent cures or longer-lasting relief. Homeopathy, the second most popular system of medicine worldwide, has earned a strong reputation for effectively managing various skin ailments. Homeopaths have long recognized the significance of skin diseases since the early days of homeopathy, which dates back two centuries. In fact, homeopaths identified the connections between [skin diseases](https://www.thehealthsite.com/diseases-conditions/sun-exposure-can-relieve-skin-conditions-how-much-exposure-is-good-according-to-experts-981339/) and symptoms of other systems, such as the musculoskeletal and respiratory systems, well before conventional medicine established these multi-system associations. Through homeopathic treatment, many seemingly incurable conditions can potentially achieve long-term remission, and in some cases, cease to manifest at all. One of the significant advantages of homeopathy is its lack of side effects. Even during prolonged treatment, patients do not experience adverse effects from [homeopathic medicines](https://www.thehealthsite.com/ayush/homeopathy-foods-to-avoid-while-taking-homeopathic-medicines-906903/), unlike the extended use of conventional medications, including topical agents. The occurrence of side effects from conventional medicines often prompts patients to turn to homeopathy, as discontinuing the former becomes necessary. These side effects can sometimes be more severe than the original disease itself. There is a common misconception that homeopathic treatment for skin diseases is a slow process. However, this is not entirely accurate. Homeopathy can deliver fast-acting results. Nevertheless, when compared to the transient relief provided by conventional treatment for apparently incurable conditions, a treatment period of several months or occasionally years is still shorter than a patient's lifetime. Conventional treatment, although providing temporary relief, is usually continued throughout the patient's life, making it the longer-lasting option. Whether it's acne vulgaris resulting from hormonal changes or [eczema](https://www.thehealthsite.com/diseases-conditions/psoriasis/eczema-and-psoriasis-how-to-spot-the-difference-between-these-two-skin-conditions-763523/) triggered by environmental allergens, homeopathy can help alleviate these symptoms. In allergic conditions like eczema and urticaria, homeopathy not only provides short-term relief during acute episodes but also reduces their severity, frequency, and duration. Homeopathic medicines may assist in building tolerance towards allergens, addressing the underlying causes, and offering longer-lasting relief. Conditions like psoriasis, which affect approximately thirty percent of patients' joints, are approached holistically by homeopaths. By taking into account the patient's overall health, early identification of non-dermatological symptoms associated with skin diseases becomes possible, allowing for proactive intervention before significant discomfort arises. It is important to note that not all skin conditions are curable, and claims suggesting otherwise should be subjected to scrutiny. Patients must also understand that medical practice cannot guarantee a cure or predict the exact time it will take to improve their condition. With experience, clinicians can provide estimates, but they also acknowledge the significant variations in treatment responses and communicate this to patients. In conclusion, homeopathy offers a valuable approach to managing common skin conditions. With its focus on holistic treatment and absence of side effects, homeopathy provides an alternative for patients seeking long-lasting relief and permanent solutions. By leveraging the benefits of homeopathic medicine, individuals can find relief from various skin ailments and improve their overall well-being. The article is contributed by Dr. Kushal Banerjee, M.D. (Hom.), MSc (Oxon), Dr. Kalyan Banerjee's Clinic, New Delhi.
